atmosphere.description: The most abundant gas in Earth's atmosphere, inert under standard conditions.
Essential for aerobic respiration and combustion.
A noble gas, inert and used in various industrial applications.
A greenhouse gas involved in photosynthesis and climate change.
A noble gas used in lighting and high-voltage indicators.
Second lightest element, used in cryogenics and balloons.
A potent greenhouse gas emitted by biological activity.
A heavy noble gas used in lighting and photography.
The lightest element in the universe, found in trace amounts.
A rare noble gas used in anesthesia and ion propulsion systems.
